text.section: for election of directors and other officials by unit or district;
for voting by stockholders on the basis of one vote per member or one vote per dwelling unit rather than one vote per share;
that any action required or permitted to be taken at a meeting of stockholders may be taken by mail ballot;

for a method of membership representation of stockholders at meetings by delegates from units or districts, provided that delegates must be proportional to the number of members in each unit district;
for redemption or recall of stock;
for termination of membership rights and privileges of a stockholder;
standards for eligibility to become a stockholder;
for the allocation of its net savings among the uses permitted in section twelve.
